comment.body: @Nutomic: Yeah, sadly. I wish there was a way to fix it. The spam gets a little annoying.
@Nutomic: I have absolutely no idea. I submitted a few questions similar to this that would help to ZeroTalk, but nobody has responded yet.
@Nutomic: seems like they have the same content though.
@Spukkin Faceship: HE'S PAST THE POINT OF NO RETURN!
